explains: n. 主席的身份或资格

sentences.en: The government has set up a committee under the chairmanship of Professor Roy Goode.
sentences.cn: 该政府成立了一个委员会，由罗伊·古德教授担任主席。

sentences.en: He made a renunciation of his chairmanship.
I also want to thank Donald for his excellent chairmanship.
sentences.cn: 我也要感谢唐纳德精彩的主持。
